Author: help_with_stuff
Text: i plan too do that but for now i want the science behind restoration if that makes sense, to alleviate my fears. i am far too weak to be weight lifting anything right now.

Author: CloudySideDown
Text: It depends on how long but I bet at least some of that weight gain is food related. But weight gain isnt a bad thing anyway. I don't want to suggest anything triggering but if you do a bit of weight lifting along with eating a bit more you could get some really nice muscle gains that may help you not feel so bad about gaining?
